name: satiRPG
description:
My first fully finished project on RPGmakerVXAce!

Over 400 hours of development, education and learning how to make the best game I truly can. But instead you get this.

SatiRPG is a satirical RPG (hence the name haha lol) that details the epic journey of a brave skeleton and his band of friends in their journey to save the world! But just maybe, they'll learn a thing or two along the way.

This game is packed to the brim with stupid references to games and music, and rubbish from my childhood so if you're a #90skid theres probably some stuff in here for you.

The game is completely SFW but does include some naughty swear words (nothing racist, unless you include insults towards skeletons as racist)
